item.description:
April Meetup: The Future of Transportation
Central Square, Cambridge

If you haven't come to one of these events yet, this meeting is the perfect time to begin!

While you're there, join us for a beverage, some yummy appetizers, meet new people, find out how you can contribute to the good fight for our environment. This meeting - open to all - will also have Sierra Club activists who will update us on the proposed gas tax, greater Boston transportation issues, and ways to get involved with Sierra's environmental issues!

Questions? Call Mary Ann Nelson 617-442-0123 or manelsonnew@gmail.com

Free, but due to limited space, RSVPs are required for this event.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Sierra Club button and nametag

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group
